name: Relaxing Lawnmower Simulator
storyline:
Ever wanted a relaxing game to play while watching movies, or just to distract yourself?
Relaxing Lawnmower Simulator is simple, calming game to play when stressed, or while you're watching movies in the background. It features a freeroam mode, where you can freely roam in a wide field of grass to mow, while listening to the sound of distant waves and birds.
summary: Sit back and relax while calmly mowing grass in a wide field near the ocean. Or, if you want a challenge, try to mow the residents lawn before they get annoyed at you...
